trans-unit.source: Converts service, contract, and endpoint information into metadata documents.
trans-unit.target: Converte informações de serviço, contrato e ponto de extremidade em documentos de metadados.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> class to transform <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects into metadata represented by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> classe transformar <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objetos nos metadados representado por <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> is used in a three-step process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> é usado em um processo de três etapas.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> method, passing the appropriate parameters.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> método, passando os parâmetros apropriados.

trans-unit.source: Determine whether there are any export errors by checking the base <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Determinar se há erros de exportação, verificando a base de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If there are no errors, use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> to get a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects or get more specific versions of the metadata using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedXmlSchemas%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum erro, use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> para obter uma coleção de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objetos ou obter versões mais específicas de metadados usando o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedXmlSchemas%2A> propriedades.

trans-unit.source: You can support exporting custom WSDL extensions by implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> interface and custom policy assertions by implementing the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> interface.
trans-unit.target: Você pode dar suporte a exportação extensões WSDL personalizadas implementando a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlExportExtension> interface e declarações de política personalizada com a implementação de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension> interface.

trans-unit.source: For details, see the documentation for those interfaces.
trans-unit.target: Para obter detalhes, consulte a documentação para essas interfaces.

trans-unit.source: The `WsdlExporter` can only be used to export metadata from `ContractDescription` instances that contain Common Language Runtime (CLR) type information, such as a `ContractDescription` instance created using the `ContractDescription.GetContract` method or created as part of the `ServiceDescription` for a `ServiceHost` instance.
trans-unit.target: O `WsdlExporter` só pode ser usado para exportar metadados de `ContractDescription` instâncias que contêm o Common Language Runtime (CLR) digite informações, como um `ContractDescription` instância criada usando o `ContractDescription.GetContract` método ou criado como parte do `ServiceDescription` para um `ServiceHost` instância.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the `WsdlExporter` to export metadata from `ContractDescription` instances imported from service metadata or constructed without type information.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível usar o `WsdlExporter` para exportar metadados de `ContractDescription` instâncias importados de metadados de serviço ou construída sem informações de tipo.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> method to generate a set of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects from the endpoints in a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects called `myServiceEndpoints`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> método para gerar um conjunto de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objetos de pontos de extremidade em uma coleção de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objetos chamados `myServiceEndpoints`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter" />.

trans-unit.source: Use to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> object.
trans-unit.target: Use para criar um <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> to generate metadata from.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription" /> do qual os metadados devem ser gerados.

trans-unit.source: Exports metadata that describes only the contract information from the specified contract description.
trans-unit.target: Exporta os metadados que descrevem apenas as informações de contrato da descrição de contrato especificada.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A> method to export metadata from only one contract.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A> método para exportar metadados de apenas um contrato.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to call <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A> to export only contract information.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como chamar <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A> para exportar apenas as informações de contrato.

trans-unit.source: The exporter encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: O exportador encontrou um erro.

trans-unit.source: The contract is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: O contrato é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> about which to return metadata.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> sobre o qual os metadados devem ser retornados.

trans-unit.source: Generates metadata about the specified endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Gera metadados sobre o ponto de extremidade especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> method to create metadata about a single endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> método para criar os metadados sobre um ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to export a single endpoint.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como exportar um único ponto de extremidade.

trans-unit.source: The exporter encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: O exportador encontrou um erro.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="endpoint" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="endpoint" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The binding is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: A associação é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> objects about which to generate metadata.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> sobre os quais os metadados devem ser gerados.

trans-unit.source: The name of the service.
trans-unit.target: O nome do serviço.

trans-unit.source: Generates metadata about a group of endpoints from a specified service.
trans-unit.target: Gera metadados sobre um grupo de pontos de extremidade de um serviço especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> method to create metadata about a set of endpoints from a specified service.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A> método para criar os metadados sobre um conjunto de pontos de extremidade de um serviço especificado.

trans-unit.source: The exporter encountered an error.
trans-unit.target: O exportador encontrou um erro.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="wsdlServiceQName" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="wsdlServiceQName" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: A binding is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma associação é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> objects after calling one of the export methods.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> depois de chamar um dos métodos de exportação.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> property returns documents only as a result of calls to either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedWsdlDocuments%2A> propriedade retorna documentos somente como resultado de chamadas para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a set of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> objects after calling one of the export methods.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um conjunto de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> depois de chamar um dos métodos de exportação.

trans-unit.source: A set of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um conjunto de <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema" /> objetos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedXmlSchemas%2A> property returns documents only as a result of calls to either <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GeneratedXmlSchemas%2A> propriedade retorna documentos somente como resultado de chamadas para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerable collection of generated <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma coleção enumerável de objetos <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> gerados.

trans-unit.source: An enumerable collection of generated <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> objects that represents the metadata generated as a result of calls to <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription)" />, <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint)" />, or <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName)" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção enumerável de objetos <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection" /> gerados que representa os metadados gerados como resultado de chamadas para <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract(System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription)" />, <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint(System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint)" /> ou <see cref="M:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint},System.Xml.XmlQualifiedName)" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> property to get a collection of all the metadata generated as a result of any number of calls to <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, or <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.GetGeneratedMetadata%2A> propriedade para obter uma coleção de todos os metadados gerados como resultado de qualquer número de chamadas para <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportContract%2A>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A>, ou <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoints%2A>.

trans-unit.source: It is recommended that you check the base <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> property to determine whether any errors occurred before you retrieve the metadata.
trans-unit.target: É recomendável que você verifique a base de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataExporter.Errors%2A> propriedade para determinar se ocorreu algum erro antes de recuperar os metadados.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> method to generate a set of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objects from the endpoints in a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objects called `myServiceEndpoints`.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.WsdlExporter.ExportEndpoint%2A> método para gerar um conjunto de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MetadataSection> objetos de pontos de extremidade em uma coleção de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint> objetos chamados `myServiceEndpoints`.
